message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.PL

This paper discusses the use of federated authentication to improve system security, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also describes the implementation of federated authentication on a production HPC system, which relates to distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper also discusses the user experience and the motivations behind the implementation, which falls under software engineering (cs.SE) and human-computer interaction (cs.CY). Finally, the paper mentions the use of multi-factor authentication, which relates to programming languages (cs.PL) and the implementation of security protocols.
